channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan Launches New Electronic Referendum Campaign System
item.description: Taiwan is launching a new online platform that will allow members of the public to sign referendum petitions electronically.

item.title: TSMC Wins US$6.6B U.S. Subsidy for Advanced Chips at Arizona Plant
item.description: The U.S. has said it will provide up to US$6.6 billion for Tawain's chip giant TSMC to expand its semiconductor fabs in the U.S. state of Arizona.

item.title: Han Kuang 2024 To Focus on Decentralized Command, Independent Defense
item.description: Taiwan's military has laid out the plan for this year's Han Kuang exercises. The two-part drills will include secret war gaming and live-fire exercises in different parts of the co

item.title: Dozens of Buildings Rendered Unstable by Hualien Earthquake
item.description: Dozens of buildings across Taiwan face demolition or extensive renovation work after last week's earthquake. What will happen to residents in the long term is unclear.
